metadata.title: CVE-2015-7995 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The xsltStylePreCompute function in preproc.c in libxslt 1.1.28 does notcheck if the parent node is an element, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service via a crafted XML file, related to a "type confusion"issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7995` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2.1
xsltproc - 1.1.28-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxslt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.28-2.1').
